nodes.documentation:
@title Chats token
 * @dev Implementation of the Chats standard token.
nodes.name: Chats

nodes.documentation:
The contract can be initialized with a number of tokens
All the tokens are deposited to the owner address     *
     * @param _initialSupply Initial supply of the contract 0 (1,000,0000 CHA Token)

nodes.name: issue

nodes.documentation:
Redeem tokens.
These tokens are withdrawn from the owner address if the balance must be enough to cover the redeem
or the call will fail.
     * @param _amount Number of tokens to be issued
nodes.name: redeem

@title Chats token
 * @dev Implementation of the Chats standard token.
attributes.name: Chats

attributes.documentation:
The contract can be initialized with a number of tokens
All the tokens are deposited to the owner address     *
     * @param _initialSupply Initial supply of the contract 0 (1,000,0000 CHA Token)

These tokens are withdrawn from the owner address if the balance must be enough to cover the redeem
or the call will fail.
     * @param _amount Number of tokens to be issued

devdoc.details: Implementation of the Chats standard token.

allowance(address,address).details: Function to check the amount of tokens that an owner allowed to a spender.

params._owner: address The address which owns the funds.
params._spender: address The address which will spend the funds.

allowance(address,address).return: A uint specifying the amount of tokens still available for the spender.

approve(address,uint256).details: Approve the passed address to spend the specified amount of tokens on behalf of msg.sender.

params._spender: The address which will spend the funds.
params._value: The amount of tokens to be spent.

balanceOf(address).details: Gets the balance of the specified address.

params._address: The address to return the its balance.

balanceOf(address).return: An uint256 representing the amount owned by the _address.

cancelOwnershipTransfer().details: Allows for the cancellation of the OwnershipTransfer

completeOwnershipTransfer().details: Allows for the finalization of the initiated Ownership Transfer

params._initialSupply: Initial supply of the contract 0 (1,000,0000 CHA Token)

initiateOwnershipTransfer(address).details: Allows the owner to initiate and Ownership control of the contract to a newOwner.

isOwner(address).details: returns trure is address is the contract Owner.

params._address: - The address of the conntract Owner.

params._amount: Number of tokens to be issued

pause().details: called only by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state

params._amount: Number of tokens to be issued

transfer(address,uint256).details: transfer token for a specified address

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Transfer tokens from one address to another

params._from: address The address which you want to send tokens from
params._to: address The address which you want to transfer to
params._value: uint the amount of tokens to be transferred

unpause().details: called only by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state

devdoc.title: Chats token

methods.constructor: The contract can be initialized with a number of tokens All the tokens are deposited to the owner address     *

issue(uint256,address).notice: Issue a new amount of tokens these tokens are deposited into the owner address This is for issuing of token to the user or the beneficiary of the NGO

redeem(uint256).notice: Redeem tokens. These tokens are withdrawn from the owner address if the balance must be enough to cover the redeem or the call will fail.
